content:
# The coal has been successfully inserted into the stone furnace, which now has 5 coal as fuel.
# 
# However, the furnace is still reporting that it has no ingredients to smelt, meaning I need to insert iron ore into it to begin the smelting process.

# I will now insert some of the 10 iron ore I have into the stone furnace to allow it to start smelting.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting iron ore into the stone furnace for smelting.
